text: Rainer Stadelmann (24 October 1933 â€“ 14 January 2019) was a German Egyptologist. He was considered an expert on the archaeology of the Giza Plateau. He was born in Oettingen, Bavaria, Germany. Stadelmann died on 14 January 2019 at the age of 85. == References == Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German archaeologists Category:People from Bavaria
title: Rainer Stadelmann
